text: Emi? Vari purvikula gatha variki andaleda? Nuh jati vari, ad, samud, ibrahim jati vari, mad yan (su'aib) prajala mariyu talakrindulu ceyabadina pattanala (lut) vari (gathalu andaleda)? Vari pravaktalu vari vaddaku spastamaina sucanalu tisukoni vaccaru. Allah variki an'yayam ceyadalacu koledu kani vare tamaku tamu an'yayam cesukuntu unnaru
